roleset.name: take off of a list
roleset.note: DELIST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'delist' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'list'. (from delist.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: temporary
example.text: John-1 was delisted *trace*-1 from Mary's list of "people I'd consider kissing."
example.arg: from Mary's list of "people I'd consider kissing."
